events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesnâ€™t fit me well. I would like to return it and get a full refund.
The issue was identified as a refund request related to product return and money back.
The refund request case has been assigned to a customer support agent for further handling.
Hello! I am here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you wish to return.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small despite choosing the size chart carefully.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process once you send back the jacket within 14 days.
That sounds good, I will send the jacket back tomorrow and keep you updated on the shipping.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the refund arrived today, and I appreciate your help throughout the process. Thank you!
The case has been formally closed after successful refund and customer confirmation of satisfaction.
